title: Simple Quiz
text: 15-puzzle is a classic sliding puzzle consisting of numbered tiles arranged in a 4x4 grid

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
text: Tic-Tac-Toe is a classic two-player game where players take turns marking Xs and Os

title: Guessing game
text: A number guessing game where the one tries to guess a random number between 1 and 100

title: Word Search
text: Word Search is a classic puzzle game where players find and highlight hidden words

title: Memory game
text: It is a  game where user remembers the colored boxes displayed and click on the boxes once the game starts .

title: Matching pairs
text: A fun game where users flip cards to reveal hidden images and try to match pairs by remembering their positions

title: Typing speed test
text: A test where users type given words or sentences as quickly and accurately as possible within a set time limit.

title: Color spotters
text: A color spotter game where the user identifies and clicks on the odd-colored tile among a grid of tiles in a limited time.

title: 15Puzzle
text: 15-puzzle is a classic sliding puzzle consisting of numbered tiles arranged in a 4x4 grid

title: Rapid fire
text: It is a rapid-fire quiz where users answer as many questions as possible within a perticular time.

title: Calculating speed
text: It tests your calculating speed by presenting mathematical expressions that need to solve within a set time.

title: Suduku Game
text: A classic puzzle game where the objective is to fill a 9x9 grid with numbers from 1 to 9 .
